articles.title: Object downed over Yukon a 'suspected balloon': top soldier - CBC News
articles.description: Chief of the Defence Staff Gen. Wayne Eyre said the flying object the North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) shot down Saturday is believed to have been a balloon, and the remote area where the debris landed is making recovery efforts difficult.
